org.mongodb.morphia.converters

Class CustomConverters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mongodb.morphia.converters.Converters
      • org.mongodb.morphia.converters.CustomConverters

  • public class CustomConverters
extends Converters
    Defines a bundle of converters that will delegate to the DefaultConverters for unknown types but provides a chance to override the converter used for different types.
    See Also:
    DefaultConverters

      CustomConverters(Mapper mapper)
      Creates a bundle with a particular Mapper.
